overview: Gato lives with his teenage daughter Emma and a small group of people, on an isolated farm, without phone or internet. But Emma, ​​tempted by curiosity, gets a mobile phone and activates it, making herself visible to the world. Hours later he runs away from the farm. Gato sets out on his search accompanied by his friend Sombra, with whom 17 years ago, they were about to be captured by a sect. Together they must rescue Emma who has been kidnapped by the same organization to carry out a bloody ritual.
title: Shadow of the Cat
